snippet.title: Fragment: A Story in Growing | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Fragment: A Story in Growing is a stream-of-consciousness life simulator game. Live the daily struggles of a normal Chinese father at the turn of the millennium, trying to live a meaningful life, raising your beloved daughter from a carefree fairy tale childhood to becoming a strong, happy adult.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2573670/Fragment_A_Story_in_Growing/
